name: Stableboy
ability: Each night, you learn 1 in-play character.

name: Wench
ability: Each night, you learn a player. They are drunk until dusk and any information they receive is false.
firstNightReminder: Mark a player with the "Drunk & False info" reminder token. Wake the Wench and point to that player.
otherNightReminder: Mark a player with the "Drunk & False info" reminder token. Wake the Wench and point to that player.

name: Genius
ability: Each night, choose a good character: you have that ability until you choose again. You are drunk every other night until dusk.
firstNightReminder: The Genius points to a good character on their sheet. Swap the character token with the Genius token and add the 'Is the Genius' reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Genius points to a good character on their sheet. Swap the character token with the Genius' current token. On every other night, place the 'Drunk' reminder token on the Genius.

name: Tycoon
ability: Each night*, learn if you shook hands with an evil player today. 1 player that you have ever shaken hands with is drunk.
otherNightReminder: Choose whether or not to make a player the Tycoon shook hands with drunk. Wake the Tycoon and nod yes if they shook hands with an evil player, otherwise shake your head no.

name: Astrologer
ability: Each day, ask the Storyteller to tell you 1 piece of false information.

name: Coachman
ability: Each day, choose a 1 word topic on which the Storyteller tells you 1 fact. If an alive neighbour is evil, you get false info.
firstNightReminder: Mark the Coachman with False Info if a living neighbour is evil.
otherNightReminder: Mark the Coachman with False Info if a living neighbour is evil.

name: Nun
ability: Good Townsfolk can not be drunk, poisoned, or get false information.

name: Occultist
ability: You might be executed unless you are mad about learning something new every day. Once per game, when you visit the Storyteller, you learn a fact.

name: Prisoner
ability: You may not vote. You know 1 not-in-play character. If most players vote to free you, become that character & alignment.
firstNightReminder: Show the Prisoner a not-in-play character.

name: Amaniti
ability: Your neighbors register falsely to good players' abilities.
firstNightReminder: Mark the Amaniti's neighbours with Registers Falsely

jinxes.reason: The Amaniti's neighbours do not register falsely to the Ogre.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Amaniti ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.

name: Biblioclast
ability: You start choosing a character for each not in-play Outsider. Chosen abilities yield false info. [-1 to +1 Outsiders]

name: Daughter of Nox
ability: Good's info is reversed. The 1st time each player names you: lose your ability (if they are good) or regain it (if they are evil).

jinxes.reason: The Puzzlemaster is unaffected by the Daughter of Nox.

name: Virilus
ability: Each night, choose a player to infect. Infected who nominate, die & infect the nominee. After day 4, evil wins.
